cobbleloots.midnightconfig.title: Cobbleloots Settings
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.xp_enabled.to: If enabled, loot balls can give XP to the player upon opening.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.bonus_enabled: If enabled, opening a loot ball has a chance to trigger a bonus.
The probability (0.0 - 1.0) of a bonus triggering.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.bonus_multipl: The multiplier applied to the item count when a bonus is triggered.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.bonus_invisib: Determines if bonus loot balls should be invisible (if applicable to the specific variant).
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_en: Master switch for loot ball world generation.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_ch: The chance for a loot ball to generate in a valid chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_at: Number of attempts to place a loot ball per chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.generation_ch: Maximum number of loot balls allowed to generate in a single chunk.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_enab: Master switch for dynamic loot ball spawning.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_chan: The chance for a spawn attempt to succeed.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_cool: Minimum time (in ticks) between spawn attempts (300 ticks = 15 seconds).
Maximum time (in ticks) between spawn attempts.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.spawning_desp: If enabled, spawned loot balls will eventually disappear if not collected.
Time (in ticks) before a spawned loot ball despawns (24000 ticks = 20 minutes).
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_enabl: If enabled, players can fish up loot balls.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_chanc: The chance to fish up a loot ball when catching something.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.fishing_luck_: Multiplier applied to fishing chance per level of Luck of the Sea.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.survival_drop: If enabled, players can break loot balls to pick them up as items.
If enabled, loot balls will drop as items automatically when their uses are exhausted (unless destroyed).
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.survival_dest: If enabled, loot balls are completely destroyed (vanish) when their uses are exhausted. Overrides drop automatic.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.defaults_uses: Default number of times a loot ball can be opened.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.defaults_xp.t: Default amount of XP contained in a loot ball.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.defaults_play: Default cooldown (in ticks) for a player to re-open a multi-use loot ball.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.defaults_effe: If enabled, particles and floating items will appear when opening a loot ball.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.disabled_dime: List of dimension IDs where world generation is disabled.
List of dimension IDs where spawning is disabled.
List of dimension IDs where fishing loot is disabled.
List of dimension IDs where archaeology loot is disabled.
cobbleloots.midnightconfig.disabled_loot: List of loot ball IDs or patterns to disable.
